channel.description: Recent content in Val on tlake.io

item.title: Hawthorne MacDarmott
item.description: Description Appearance A male chromatic dragonborn, constantly shifting between the chromatic colors. Personality Biography He was once the mayor of shadow-Leilon and a herald of Tiamat, until the Menagerie slew him and Val took his jawbone and flaming greatsword.

item.title: Val
item.description: Val wood elf druid (D&D Beyond) never surprised flexible morality a real dwarfâ€™s elf some kind of royalty Description Appearance Personality Biography Born as Nadyantal’laval Has a brother, Elirion’tar. Apparently, Val has other siblings, including an eldest brother.
